xml.data:
Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 2 Kusalattika » 2.7 Pañhāvāra » 2.7.4 Paccayapaccanīyānuloma
Naāsevanaduka
Kusalattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayapaccanīyānuloma
Naāsevanaduka
505.
1741Naāsevanapaccayā hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare pañca, samanantare pañca, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye terasa, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, kamme satta, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre satta, indriye satta, jhāne satta, magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā terasa, natthiyā pañca, vigate pañca, avigate terasa…pe… .
  •  Navaka
<< Dasakaup Navaka >>
